trans-unit.source: Represents the displayable claim object.
trans-unit.target: 代表可顯示的宣告物件。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the display tag (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> property) and the description (the Description property) are localized.
trans-unit.target: 通常，顯示標記 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A>屬性) 和描述 （描述屬性） 會當地語系化。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A> property identifies different claim types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A>屬性會識別不同的宣告類型。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display value (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A> property) is the string representation of the claim.Resource.
trans-unit.target: 顯示值 （<xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A>屬性） 是宣告的字串表示。資源。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref>具有指定的宣告類型的類別。

trans-unit.source: The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType*> property.
claimType is or an empty string.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type, display name, and description.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref>類別具有指定宣告類型、 顯示名稱和描述。

trans-unit.source: The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType*> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 顯示名稱 （或好記的名稱），顯示的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag*> property.
The description for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description*> property.
claimType is or an empty string.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type, display name, display value, and description.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref>類別具有指定宣告類型、 顯示名稱、 顯示值和描述。

trans-unit.source: The claim is required.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional%2A> property is initialized to `true` in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional%2A>屬性會初始化為`true`新執行個體中。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional%2A>

trans-unit.source: The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType*> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 顯示名稱 （或好記的名稱），顯示的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag*> property.
The description for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description*> property.
The display value for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue*> property.
claimType is or an empty string.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref> class that has the specified claim type, display name, display value, description, and optional attribute.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref>類別具有指定宣告類型、 顯示名稱、 顯示值、 描述和選擇性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The claim type for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.ClaimType*> property.
The display name (or friendly name) for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 顯示名稱 （或好記的名稱），顯示的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag*> property.
The description for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description*> property.
The display value for the display claim.
Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayValue*> property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the claim is optional; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果宣告是選擇性的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Optional*> property.
claimType is or an empty string.
Gets the claim type associated with the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 取得顯示宣告相關聯的宣告類型。

trans-unit.source: This required attribute provides the unique identifier (URI) of the individual claim returned in the security token
trans-unit.target: 需要這個屬性會提供唯一的識別項 (URI) 的個別傳入安全性權杖的宣告

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the claim type.
Creates a display claim from the specified claim type.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示宣告建立從指定的宣告型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> properties are set to default values based on the specified claim type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A>屬性會設定為指定的宣告類型為基礎的預設值。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.Description%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim.DisplayTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: If default values do not exist for the properties, they are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性沒有預設值，它們會設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The URI that represents the claim type.
Returns <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Metadata.DisplayClaim"></xref>.
Gets or sets a description for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示宣告的描述。

trans-unit.source: This optional element provides a description of the semantics for the claim returned in the security token.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目提供的語意傳回安全性權杖中宣告的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description for the display claim.
Gets or sets the friendly name for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示宣告的好記名稱。

trans-unit.source: This optional element provides a friendly name for the claim returned in the security token.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目提供傳回安全性權杖中宣告的好記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 顯示宣告的好記的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a displayable value for the display claim.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示宣告的可顯示值。

trans-unit.source: This optional element provides one or more displayable values for the claim returned in the security token.
trans-unit.target: 此選擇性項目提供一或多可顯示傳回的值之宣告的安全性權杖中。

trans-unit.source: The displayable value for the display claim.
Gets or sets the optional attribute for the display claim
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示宣告的選用屬性

trans-unit.source: The optional attribute.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the display claim is optional; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果顯示宣告是選擇性的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the optional attribute will be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可序列化的選用屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to serialize the optional attribute; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要序列化的選用屬性;否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
